articles.title: Stocks plunge, with the S&P 500 ending its worst week since March 2023 - CBS News
articles.description: Investors are fretting about economic growth, with tech stocks taking the brunt after an underwhelming jobs report.
articles.content:
Wall Street ended its worst week in 18 months after a weaker-than-expected jobs report on Friday stoked investor concerns about slowing U.S. economic growth. 
Technology stocks took the brunt of the… [+5725 chars]
